**Research interests**\
- Large-scale physical oceanography from the tropics to the high latitudes\
- Ocean-sea ice modelling\
- Internal climate variability and its atmospheric teleconnections\
- Ocean heat content\
- Central European atmospheric circulation\

**Education**\
- Doctor of Philosophy UNSW in Climate Science, Sydney, Australia (2023), [2-page summary](files/Huguenin_Maurice_Thesis_Summary_20241219.pdf)\
- Master of Science ETH in Atmospheric and Climate Science, Zurich, Switzerland (2018)\
- Bachelor of Science ETH in Earth Sciences, Zurich, Switzerland (2016)\
